price: El final de ambos será el Infierno donde sufrirán eternamente. Este es el final de los injustos.
arabic: فَكَانَ عَٰقِبَتَهُمَآ أَنَّهُمَا فِي ٱلنَّارِ خَٰلِدَيۡنِ فِيهَاۚ وَذَٰلِكَ جَزَٰٓؤُاْ ٱلظَّٰلِمِينَ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: fakāna ʿāqibatahumā annahumā fī al-nāri khālidayni fīhā wadhālika jazāu al-ẓālimīna
